Iphone 14
The iPhone 14 display has rounded corners that follow a beautiful curved design, and these corners are within a standard rectangle.
  • Super Retina XDR OLED, HDR10
  • 6.1 inches, 90.2 cm2
  • Apple A15 Bionic (5 nm)
  • Hexa-core (2x3.23 GHz Avalanche + 4x1.82 GHz Blizzard)
  • Apple GPU (5-core graphics)
  • 12 MP, f/1.5, 26mm (wide), 1/1.7", 1.9µm, dual pixel PDAF
